name: Pwupmkin Poetwy
description:
Pwumpkin Poetwy!

Join Sheet Cat on Halloween night and listen to the fur-folk of Ghost Street recite their famous Halloween poems! Take a brisk trot down the sidewalk, listen to jammin tunes on your owoPod, and read a collection of personal pumpkiny poetry!

It’s a short game with two... (I think) possible endings, so please take your time and soak it all in! <3

BTW! If you like the soundtrack, you can download it and support me (uwu) by clicking this link! Right here!

[Twitter] [Bandcamp] [YouTube]
